record.name: Web Server Hosting
record.description: Dedicated Web Hosting provides the facilities, network, and infrastructure services that enable a robust foundation for web-based systems, especially complex environments that have mission critical needs. It's designed for the Internet and Intranet and is delivered from key hosting locations.
record.detailedDescription: Dedicated Web Hosting provides the facilities, network, and infrastructure services that enable a robust foundation for web-based systems, especially complex environments that have mission critical needs. It's designed for the Internet and Intranet and is delivered from key hosting locations.
